climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Versatile Usage】Modern style dining chairs with overall size: 22.83 "W x 20.47 "D x 32.87 "H. The dining chairs boast a simple and modern style, suitable for various settings such as family dining, outdoor events, dining rooms, restaurants, hotels, and guest room/kitchen areas.

【Thickened Cushion】The dining chairs are equipped with a new generation of thickened high-density sponge cushions. The high-elastic backrest design offers full back support, tilts back 10 degrees, and promotes blood circulation for a comfortable, fatigue-free sitting experience.

【 Premium Materials】Made of high-grade PU leather, our dining room chairs are wear-resistant, scratch-resistant, waterproof, and easy to maintain. Its skin-friendly and non-irritating properties ensure a healthy dining experience.

【Sturdy Base】 Constructed with four-point support, the 2.5 cm diameter chair legs are made of pure beech wood material which is hard and rot-resistant. The dining chair's maximum weight capacity is 275 pounds, and non-slip pads on the legs protect your floors from scratches.

【Easy to Assemble】The kitchen chairs come with installation instructions and all necessary hardware and tools. We also provide videos to help you get your chairs installed in 10-15 minutes. If you have any questions about the product, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enhance your dining room experience with our sophisticated, contemporary, and stylish dining chairs.

Durable & Sturdy Designed to be sturdy and durable with heavy-duty rubberwood legs that provide a weight capacity of 275 lbs. Thick Cushion thickened high-density sponge cushions reduce fatigue, making them ideal for extended periods of sitting. Elegant Design A streamlined silhouette and sleek shape give these chairs a modern style that complements any home decor. Non-slip Footpads come with non-slip footpads that prevent direct contact between the legs of the chairs and the floor.

How to Install Our Dining Chairs? The 4 set chairs require basic assembly which can be done in just 20 minutes. Please refer to the installation video located on the right side of the page for step-by-step instructions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful modern chairs at an amazing price.
reviews.reviewText: I bought a set of these chairs two years ago and I love them. They still look brand new. I needed two more chairs and was hoping these would be a match. They were the exact same chairs. At this price I didn't mind that I had to buy all four. I will donate the other two to my daughter who never has enough chairs.There's enough cushion that they are comfortable to sit in for long periods of time. They are very sturdy for my 3 year old and 5 year old grandkids. They are relatively lightweight, but the way the legs angle out give it extra stability. They are super easy to keep clean, even the white ones. Assembly was super easy. My husband had all of them put together in about 20 minutes.If you like the looks of these chairs, you will love the durability of them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with theses chairs. Easy to assemble, looks great, good construction, comfortable, and affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Hands down, I'd highly recommend these chairs to anyone. They are sturdy, comfortable, and look great. Easy enough to assemble. Looks great in my office. Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, cute, and easy to put together!
reviews.reviewText: The assembly was so easy and even came with a pack of tools and screws separate for each chair. Such good quality for the price, and very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Get the chairs!
reviews.reviewText: These exceeded my expectations for their price point—the lowest price point you’ll find. They are very sturdy, gorgeous chairs. The pad isn’t as comfortable and soft as I had hoped, but the chair structure makes up for it and it’s not UNcomfortable by any means—just the pad is a little hard. These will be so easy to clean. All surfaces are easy to wipe. And some of the reviews said it’s hard to clean around the pad, you can unscrew the pad from the chair and clean underneath it. A little bit of extra work, but better than it not unscrewing at all.Installation was super easy (especially if you have a drill). Comes with extras, especially extra felt pads. Manufacturer stickers come off super easy with no residue. I did have issues with two of the eight chairs with the center screws. On one, the center screw wouldn’t catch or tighten at all. The other would only tighten a little bit then suddenly be loose again. For both I just used the extra longer screws and made sure I only tightened them to the edge of the wood so not to puncture the chair, and that fixed the problem. The washers jingle a little on those chairs, but it doesn’t look like it affects the integrity of the chair at all.We got these to replace some tall back leather ones that kept cracking, wobbling, and breaking when you leaned back in them. These will definitely not have that issue, they’re so solid. My husband and I are both 200+ lbs and they don’t move or make any noise when we sit in them. I also like the little lip on the back almost like a handle. I hated having to use two hands to move my old chairs to keep them from scratching the floor or loosening even more and they were heavy—these ones are so light and easy to move.I’ll update this review if they fail in any way, but these seem like solid chairs and I’m so happy I found them. Can’t beat that price for 8 of them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with purchase
reviews.reviewText: Bought these to go with my new table that I bought from Amazon. They look great with the table and are comfortable to a certain point. I wouldn’t say they are meant to sit in for hours at a time, but they’re perfect for sitting at the table to eat my meals. The little cushion on the chair definitely helps, but I noticed if I’m sitting there longer than an hour it starts to get a little uncomfortable. Would still recommend because they are well made and sturdy.
